# netskope_privateapps (Data Source)

## Example Usage

```go
data "netskope_privateapps" "all" {}


output "PrivateApps" {
  value = data.netskope_privateapps.all.private_apps
}
```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
